New Records: Ghana are making their 24th appearance at the AFCON, the most among teams in the tournament.
André Ayew is set to equal a record with his 8th AFCON appearance and could break it by scoring.
Key Match Events: Ghana and Cape Verde have met once before, with Ghana winning 2-0 in 2013.
Ghana have won only one of their last nine AFCON matches, a 2-0 victory in 2019.
Cape Verde have never lost their opening match at AFCON, with a record of W1 D2.
Pre-Game Insights: Ghana are favorites due to experience and squad quality but face a challenging Cape Verde side.
Mohammed Kudus is crucial for Ghana, involved in 50% of their goals in qualifiers.
André Ayew aims to break a record with his seventh AFCON goal if he scores.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde's eight goals in qualifiers were scored by eight different players.
Only one of Cape Verde's 11 previous AFCON matches produced more than two goals.
